feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:35 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 07:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -35.1°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -38.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
